subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes sparkled for most of his six innings, and Jason Giambi snapped a 1-for-22 skid with a grand slam in the fifth inning as the Yankees lifted their record to 20 games over .500.
snippet: Phil Hughes sparkled for most of his six innings, and Jason Giambi snapped a 1-for-22 skid with a grand slam in the fifth inning as the Yankees lifted their record to 20 games over .500.
